de.payleven.payment

Class RefundResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.payleven.payment.RefundResult

  • public class RefundResult
extends Object
    Contains refund data which is available after the refund completion.

    • Constructor Summary

      Returns the amount of the remaining transaction balance in a decimal format.
      BigDecimal getRefundAmount()
      Returns the amount that has been requested to be refunded in a decimal format, which must be at least two minor currency units (e.g 0.02 Euro) and cannot be negative or zero.
      Currency getRefundCurrency()
      Returns three-letter alphabetic code according to ISO 4217 representing the refund's currency.

    • Method Detail

      • getRefundId

        @Deprecated
public String getRefundId()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getRefundIdentifier()

      • getRefundIdentifier

        public String getRefundIdentifier()
        Returns a unique identifier of the refund request. Please retain this identifier for your records.

      • getPaymentId

        @Deprecated
public String getPaymentId()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentIdentifier()

      • getPaymentIdentifier

        public String getPaymentIdentifier()
        Returns a unique identifier referring to the initial sale payment to be refunded. Please retain this identifier for your records and for further reference (e.g Refund).

      • getPaymentAmount

        public BigDecimal getPaymentAmount()
        Returns the amount charged with the initial sale payment in a decimal format.

      • getCurrency

        @Deprecated
public Currency getCurrency()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getRefundCurrency()

      • getRefundCurrency

        public Currency getRefundCurrency()
        Returns three-letter alphabetic code according to ISO 4217 representing the refund's currency. Currency must not deviate from initial sale payment's currency. Supported currencies are EUR, GBP and PLN.

      • getDescription

        @Deprecated
public String getDescription()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getRefundDescription()

      • getRefundDescription

        public String getRefundDescription()
        Returns the optional description provided by the merchant (max 140 characters).

      • getCreatedAt

        @Deprecated
public Date getCreatedAt()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getRefundDate()

      • getRefundDate

        public Date getRefundDate()
        Returns the local timestamp in UTC/GMT format when the refund was requested.

      • getRefundedAmount

        @Deprecated
public BigDecimal getRefundedAmount()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getRefundAmount()

      • getRefundAmount

        public BigDecimal getRefundAmount()
        Returns the amount that has been requested to be refunded in a decimal format, which must be at least two minor currency units (e.g 0.02 Euro) and cannot be negative or zero.

      • getRemainingAmount

        @Deprecated
public BigDecimal getRemainingAmount()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getRefundableAmount()

      • getRefundableAmount

        public BigDecimal getRefundableAmount()
        Returns the amount of the remaining transaction balance in a decimal format.

      • getMerchantId

        @Deprecated
public String getMerchantId()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getMerchantIdentifier()

      • getMerchantIdentifier

        public String getMerchantIdentifier()
        Returns the payleven merchant account identifier that executed the refund request.

      • getReceiptGenerator

        public ReceiptGenerator getReceiptGenerator()
        Returns an instance of ReceiptGenerator, which generates a receipt image for the refund. NOTE: Receipt image must be extended with the merchant's name, address and respective receipt identifier.
